content.text:
# 1984 Dora Mavor Moore Awards

The 1984 Dora Mavor Moore Awards celebrated excellence in theatre from the Toronto Alliance for the Performing Arts.
Winners and nominees
General Theatre Division
{| class=wikitable style="width="100%"
|-
!width="50%" |Production
!width="50%" |Original Play
|-
| valign="top" |

**Delicatessen – Toronto Free Theatre

**Trafford Tanzi – Toronto Free Theatre and National Arts Centre
| valign="top" |

**Mystery of the Oak Island Treasure by Jim Betts and John Roby – Young People's Theatre

**Tower by Lawrence Jeffery – Factory Theatre
